remarks: The properties of an associative algebra.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
isassa.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
isassa.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
isassa.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
isassa.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
isassa.t $e |- .X. = ( .r ` W ) $.
isassa $p |- ( W e. AssAlg <-> ( ( W e. LMod /\ W e. Ring /\ F e. CRing ) /\ A. r e. B A. x e. V A. y e. V ( ( ( r .x. x ) .X. y ) = ( r .x. ( x .X. y ) ) /\ ( x .X. ( r .x. y ) ) = ( r .x. ( x .X. y ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d .X. r x y $.
$d .x. r x y $.
$d B r $.
$d F r $.
$d V r x y $.
$d W r x y $.
$d r x y $.
$d x y $.
